title: Was ʿĀʾishah (RA) 19 at the time of marriage?
body:
they’re argument found in تاريخ مدينة د volume 69 page 10

It says: ibn abī al-zinād said: asmāʾ bint abī bakr was ten years older than ʿāʾishah.

in Kitāb jarh wa tadil volume 5 page 252, S͟hayk͟h ʾAḥmad ʾIbn Ḥanbal weakens Zinad, and Yaḥyā bin Ma‘īn said his Ḥadīths isn’t to be seen as hujjah (evidence)
author: ‘Abd al-Raḥmān
excerpt: Was ʿĀʾishah (RA) 19 at the time of marriage?
